explains: v. 使恶心；使讨厌（disgust 的过去分词）
wordGroup: be disgusted with 讨厌……，厌恶……

sentences.en: He disgusted many with his boorish behaviour.
sentences.cn: 他以其粗鲁的行为使许多人感到厌恶。

sentences.en: The level of violence in the film really disgusted me.
sentences.cn: 影片中的暴力程度实在让我反感。

sentences.en: The level of violence in the movie really disgusted me.
sentences.cn: 影片中的暴力程度实在让我反感。
